text: Littlest Pet Shop is an video game that was made by Electronic Arts. It is part of the Littlest Pet Shop series. The video game was released on the PC, Wii, and Nintendo DS. The game was released on October 14, 2008 in North America. ==History== In August 2007, Electronic Arts gained the rights to some Hasbro brands, like Monopoly, Littlest Pet Shop, and Nerf. In February, EA Casual Entertainment announced that their EA Salt Lake Studio would develop and release Littlest Pet Shop and Nerf N-Strike.Sinclair, Brandon. "EA details plans for Hasbro brands". GameSpot. February 11, 2008. Accessed July 26, 2008. ==Versions== The Nintendo DS was 3 separate titles. Each version had different pets."EA Announces First Hasbro Titles in Development". February 11, 2008 It also featured DGamer, the online service from Disney. ==References== == Other websites == *Littlest Pet Shop Category:2008 video games Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:DSiWare games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Simulation video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games about animals Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Virtual pet video games Category:Wii games Category:Windows games
title: Littlest Pet Shop (video game)
